header.title: Where's Waldo Mod
header.description: A small image of Waldo [US] / Wally [UK] may appear somewhere on every page as you browse the board. The probability of finding Waldo on any page can be adjusted during installation, with the default probability at 1%.
header.author-notes: Can be configured to work with the Ultimate Points MOD if you have it installed, so that finding or clicking on Waldo will give the user points.

changelog.change: First version released
Incorporated use of language constants within the ACP
Made use of trigger_error upon changing config settings
Fixed casting of some post variables (string to float)
Added z-index to the div so that Waldo appears above everything else
Cleaned up inline styling of the Waldo div
Added mouseover text (config setting)
Cleaned up changes in functions.php and overall_header.html
Added option to change the image URL (config setting)
Added log entry upon updating settings
Got rid of unnecessary reference to $waldo_link in functions.php
Added call to utf8_normalize_nfc on mouseover text
Replaced hardcoded text with language constants in ACP module
Fixed use of utf8_normalize_nfc on mouseover text
Fixed other bugs introduced in last update
Deleted another unnecessary reference to $waldo_link in functions.php
Added missing language files to the "copy" step in install.xml
Added use of a percent probability in the ACP
Added percent-based absolute positioning (got rid of the window size configs)
Added use of utf8_normalize_nfc for the URL configs
Added alt tag to waldo image
Added the ability to prevent Waldo from appearing on particular pages
Added a "waiting time" feature, to prevent users from seeing Waldo too often

edit.comment: If you have the Ultimate Points MOD installed, make sure that the below comes BEFORE the Ultimate Points code (i.e. before // Start Ultimate Points).
